coffee.name: Caffè Americano
coffee.description: Caffè Americano (also known as Americano or American;) is a type of coffee drink prepared by diluting an espresso with hot water, giving it a similar strength to, but different flavor from, traditionally brewed coffee

coffee.name: Latte
coffee.description: A latte is a coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk.

coffee.name: Cappuccino
coffee.description: Cappuccino is an espresso-based coffee drink that originated in Italy, and is traditionally prepared with steamed milk foam (microfoam).

coffee.name: Espresso
coffee.description: Espresso is coffee of Italian origin, brewed by forcing a small amount of nearly boiling water under pressure (expressing) through finely ground coffee beans
